744640.name: The Waiting Room
744640.description:
Disoriented, you wake up and realize they have taken you somewhere horrible. Only distant screams and unsettling sounds filtering through the cell walls hint at your fate. It’s cold, dark, and you are going to die. You have to find a way out but be careful, he’s watching.

The Waiting Room is a standalone mini-game taking place between Welcome to the game and the soon to be released Welcome to the Game 2.

Expanding further on the gameplay style of Welcome to the Game, The Waiting Room is a horror puzzle experience that takes you into the other side of the deep web. The game brings you back to the familiar experience of hunting for keys while bringing a whole new set of mechanics to the world around you in an all new environment. Stay vigilant.

The Waiting Room is a taste of things to come with the horror you’ve come to expect from Welcome to the Game. Return to the deep web and stay safe.

WARNING: This game may heighten paranoia and contains scenarios and images which may easily disturb the player. Player discretion is advised.
744640.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
